speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
The
               
              sun
               
              begins
               
              to
               
              gild
               
              the
               
              western
               
              sky
              ,

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
And
               
              now
               
              it
               
              is
               
              about
               
              the
               
              very
               
              hour

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
That
               
              Sylvia
               
              at
               
              Friar
               
              Patrick’s
               
              cell
               
              should
               
              meet
               
              me
              .

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
She
               
              will
               
              not
               
              fail
              ,
               
              for
               
              lovers
               
              break
               
              not
               
              hours
              ,

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
Unless
               
              it
               
              be
               
              to
               
              come
               
              before
               
              their
               
              time
              ,

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
So
               
              much
               
              they
               
              spur
               
              their
               
              expedition
              .

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
See
               
              where
               
              she
               
              comes
              .
              —
              Lady
              ,
               
              a
               
              happy
               
              evening
              .

speaker: SYLVIA
text:
Amen
              ,
               
              amen
              .
               
              Go
               
              on
              ,
               
              good
               
              Eglamour
              ,

speaker: SYLVIA
text:
Out
               
              at
               
              the
               
              postern
               
              by
               
              the
               
              abbey
               
              wall
              .

speaker: SYLVIA
text:
I
               
              fear
               
              I
               
              am
               
              attended
               
              by
               
              some
               
              spies
              .

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
Fear
               
              not
              .
               
              The
               
              forest
               
              is
               
              not
               
              three
               
              leagues
               
              off
              ;

speaker: EGLAMOUR
text:
If
               
              we
               
              recover
               
              that
              ,
               
              we
               
              are
               
              sure
               
              enough
              .
